connector.description: Send data to a RabbitMQ Broker.

camel.kamelet.spring-rabbitmq-sink.routi.name: camel.kamelet.spring-rabbitmq-sink.routingKey
camel.kamelet.spring-rabbitmq-sink.routi.description: The routing key to use when binding a consumer queue to the exchange

camel.kamelet.spring-rabbitmq-sink.usern.name: camel.kamelet.spring-rabbitmq-sink.username
camel.kamelet.spring-rabbitmq-sink.usern.description: The username to access the RabbitMQ server

camel.kamelet.spring-rabbitmq-sink.passw.name: camel.kamelet.spring-rabbitmq-sink.password
camel.kamelet.spring-rabbitmq-sink.passw.description: The password to access the RabbitMQ server

camel.kamelet.spring-rabbitmq-sink.excha.name: camel.kamelet.spring-rabbitmq-sink.exchangeName
camel.kamelet.spring-rabbitmq-sink.excha.description: The exchange name determines the exchange the queue is bound to.

camel.kamelet.spring-rabbitmq-sink.queue.name: camel.kamelet.spring-rabbitmq-sink.queues
camel.kamelet.spring-rabbitmq-sink.queue.description: The queue to receive messages from

camel.kamelet.spring-rabbitmq-sink.autoD.name: camel.kamelet.spring-rabbitmq-sink.autoDeclareProducer
camel.kamelet.spring-rabbitmq-sink.autoD.description: Specifies whether the producer should auto declare binding between exchange, queue and routing key when starting
